project_id.description: The GCP project ID for the project containing the target BigQuery dataset.
project_id.title: Project ID

dataset_id.description: The dataset ID to search for tables and views. If you are only loading data from one dataset, setting this option could result in much faster schema discovery.
dataset_id.title: Default Dataset ID

credentials_json.description: The contents of the JSON service account key. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key. Default credentials will be used if this field is left empty.
credentials_json.title: Service Account Key JSON (Required for cloud, optional for open-source)
